definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Mordecai (perh. fr. n. div. Marduk  ([[מְרׂרַךְ]]), Zim:ZAW xi.161 ff.; cf. further Wild (citing Jensen):Comm. Es 173 f.);—´[[מ]] Ezr 2:2, Es 2:5 +; [[מָרְדֳּכָָי]] Es 2:22 +;—
companion of Zerub., acc. to Ezr 2:2 = Ne 7:7. LXX Maraqxaiov, Mardoxaiov, etc:
cousin and adoptive father of Esther Es 2:5, Es 2:7, Es 2:10 + 55 t. Est. LXX Mardoxaiov.
